channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. and China extend tariff truce deadline for another 3 months
item.description: President Trump's executive order extends a reprieve from the threat of rising tariffs between the world's two largest economies.

item.title: Trump’s ‘Law and Order’ Crackdown on D.C., and Silicon Valley Embraces the Pentagon
item.description: Plus, a quiet crisis for America’s jurors.

item.title: Foreign Recruits in Ukraine Military Are Killed in Russian Missile Strike
item.description: Russia has repeatedly targeted soldiers assembled at military academies, barracks and parade grounds.

item.title: Trump's Washington, D.C. takeover targets a host of groups, many of them vulnerable
item.description: Some residents are skeptical President Trump's use of tough police tactics will work to solve complex social ills.

item.title: Say bye-bye to the beeps and boops of AOL's dial-up internet service
item.description: AOL debuted the service in 1991. Dial-up has largely been replaced by broadband internet.

item.title: Alaska was once a full-fledged Russian colony. Now it's hosting a U.S.-Russia summit
item.description: Russia lost a war in Crimea in the 1850s. To pay off war debts, Russia sold Alaska to the U.S. Now presidents Trump and Putin will meet Friday in Alas...

item.title: A Palestinian activist was killed by the violence he sought to stop
item.description: Awdah Al Hathaleen was shot during a clash with an Israeli settler. His West Bank village hoped No Other Land, the Oscar-winning film about settler vi...

item.title: Israeli Hostage Families Call for General Strike Amid Plans for Gaza Offensive
item.description: Relatives of captives held by Hamas excoriated the Israeli government for what they called “an endless war without purpose.” It was unclear how many w...

item.title: Zakaria Zubeidi, Palestinian Militia and Theater Leader, Speaks After Release From Prison
item.description: Zakaria Zubeidi inspired Palestinians and horrified Israelis. Freed from jail during a recent truce, he questions what his many lives have achieved.

item.title: As Europe’s Heat Waves Intensify, France Bickers About Air-Conditioning
item.description: As heat waves batter Europe, the need (or not) for air-conditioning has become part of the political tug of war in France between the right and the le...

item.description: Zakaria Zubeidi inspired Palestinians and horrified Israelis. Freed from jail during a recent truce, he questions what his many lives have achieved.

item.description: Russia has repeatedly targeted soldiers assembled at military academies, barracks and parade grounds.

item.title: A Glow Up Gone Awry
item.description: A restoration of a beloved figure of the Virgin Mary causes an uproar. “The Macarena cannot be made up!”
